scripts.pretest: npm run reset && npm run init
scripts.test:dev:standart: dotenv -e .env.standart -e .env.development -- cross-var npm run pretest && dotenv -e .env.standart -e .env.development -- cross-var k6 run -e PERMIFY_HOST=%PERMIFY_HOST% -e CONFIG_FILE=$(pwd)/%CONFIG_FILE% -e SUMMARY_FILE=$(pwd)/%SUMMARY_FILE% permifyTest.js
scripts.test:dev:stress: dotenv -e .env.stress -e .env.development -- cross-var npm run pretest && dotenv -e .env.stress -e .env.development -- cross-var k6 run -e PERMIFY_HOST=%PERMIFY_HOST% -e CONFIG_FILE=$(pwd)/%CONFIG_FILE% permifyTest.js
scripts.test:local:standart: dotenv -e .env.standart npm run pretest && dotenv -e .env.standart -- cross-var k6 run -e CONFIG_FILE=$(pwd)/%CONFIG_FILE% -e SUMMARY_FILE=$(pwd)/%SUMMARY_FILE% permifyTest.js
scripts.test:local:stress: dotenv -e .env.stress npm run pretest && dotenv -e .env.stress -- cross-var k6 run -e CONFIG_FILE=$(pwd)/%CONFIG_FILE% -e SUMMARY_FILE=$(pwd)/%SUMMARY_FILE% permifyTest.js
